LangSelectMsg:
Language can be changed using the menu: "{{v1}}" → "{{v2}}".

Or by pressing F1.
LibSwordDownloadMsg:
To read SWORD modules a binary executable library must be downloaded.

This library has NOT been screened by Mozilla.

Do you still wish to download this library?
MinModVersion2: Complete installation requires at least module version: {{v1}}
MustInstallQuickTime: To listen to audio content, a QuickTime plugin must be installed.
ORIGTabToolTip: Interlinear mode (only available after Hebrew or Greek Bibles are installed)
OutOfDate: The following module(s) have components which are out of date
RestartMsg: This change will take effect the next time you start the program.
SearchAdvanced.description: You may use the special search terms listed in the help table to build complex searches.
SearchAdvanced.label: Advanced matching using special search terms
SearchAnyWord.description: Finds verses that have all of the given words in the verse.
SearchAnyWord.label: Find verses which contain the word(s)
SearchExactText.description: Finds the exact word, part of a word, or phrase, everywhere that it occurs.
SearchExactText.label: Find verses which contain this exact text
SearchSimilar.description: This is useful if you don't know exactly how a word is spelled, or to find variations of words.
SearchSimilar.label: Find verses which contain similar words
TooNew: The following module(s) have components which are not supported
UpgradeMe: Upgrade the program to at least version: {{v1}}
Want2InstallQuickTime:
To listen to audio content, a QuickTime plugin must be installed.

Would you like to install the "QT Lite" plugin now?
allowInternet.message:
You are about to download Biblical texts from the Internet.
Your Internet activity may be easily monitored by others.
If this is a concern, you may click "No" to cancel this operation.
allowInternet.title: Download a Bible from the internet?
